title: BikeRadar Meets | Tracy Moseley on racing, world titles and retirement
content:
Tracy Moseley is one of the most successful mountain bikers the sport has ever seen, having secured 17 downhill World Cup wins, two overall series wins, a World Championship title and 14 Enduro World Series wins.

Now Moseley is sharing her wealth of experience with the next generation of stars through the T-Mo Racing team.

For the latest episode of the BikeRadar Meets podcast, our technical editor-in-chief, Rob Weaver, caught up with Moseley to talk through her incredible career and look to the future.
